widyagnyayan haya denekugen yuthu shri lankika samudra purawidya gaweshana kandayamak seda margaye pradhanama thotupalakwa thibu ha paranima aithihasika warayak wu ambalanthota ‚Äògodawaya‚Äô waraye purawidya gaweshanaya ada (08) aarambha kerini.me sandaha awashya mulyamaya dayakathwayan yuneskowa ha nedarlantha rajaya labadi atha.mewara sidu kerena gaweshanaya sandaha indiyawa, pilipinaya, indunisiyawa, malesiyawa yana ratawala muhudu purawidyagnyayan haya denakuda lankika gaweshakayan samaga ekwimata niyamitha athara eki pirisata yuneskowa ha nedarlanthaya mulya anugrahayan dakwayi.me gaweshanaya prathama adiyara desambar 8 dina sita 16 dina dakwa sidu kirimata siyaluma katayuthu yoda athayi shri lankika muhudu purawidya eekakaya pawasiya.

kisiyam ho deyaka gambauren niratha wana mage awadhanayen, awata thibena siyaluma da gilihi yanne nithathinma...minis kanata asena pramanaye, itha wishala shabda wala desibal agaya ewan awastha waladi mage swara parasayen gilihima aniwaryayi...kuda kala hindama pawathena ee purudda, hondinma dara gath kenek athnam, ee mage aadaraniya amma...aya tharam mage pudgalika awakashaye parimawa saha eya awasi kala welawan pilibandawa danna kisiweku thawamath mata muna gasi naha...ma thula sitina widyagnyaya, kawiya, nirmanakaruwa, saha ekinekata paraspara wu hangim gonnak athi kuda praniyage petant ayithiya sampurnayenma aa sathuyi...minisekuge paursha wardhanayata akmul wadagath wana waga ma pera thanaka liya thabuwe menna me nisayi...
